Whoops! Please accept my sincere apologies, Dcoburn, I must have 
missed that post.

::Firearm::

Firearm barely notices as one of the shots hits him, still spinning 
through the air from Menasor's earlier hits.



--- In nbwrpg@y..., "dcoburn" <dcoburn@n...> wrote:
> OOC:  Ok, look, several of my posts with my Decepticons have been 
completely ignored!  Now, read this post below I sent before, and 
Yan, post damage for Firearm, but people disregard the part about 
Squawkbox, S and B already merged.
> ----- Original Message ----- 
> From: dcoburn 
> To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
> Sent: Tuesday, February 20, 2001 5:12 PM
> Subject: Decepticons Kick Bigtime @$$
> 
> 
> ::Triggerhappy::
> 
>         Triggerhappy yelled over to Beastbox and Squawktalk.
> 
>         "What are you waiting for?  Merge into Squawkbox!  We need 
to get as powerful as possible to defeat these "Maximals."  
> 
>          Triggerhappy then fired a shot from Blowpipe at Firearm.
